long_description: Engineered specifically for triathlon competition, this Serfas saddle is up to the demands of the high-performance athlete. Extra-long nose with gel insert increases cyclist's ability to locate the ideal comfort zone. Extra-wide nose ups the comfort level. Extra-long rails extend fore and aft adjustability. Protective side bumpers aid setup and transition. Features a leather cover and hollow titanium rails.
short_description: Engineered specifically for triathlon competition, this Serfas saddle is up to the demands of the high-performance athlete.
